name: Just Drift It !
description:
"Just Drift It !" is a cool little game with custom vehicle physics based on realistic tire model and advanced suspension !
"Just Drift It !" is all about mastering controls and getting better trying to beat you best score and get higher in the leaderboards !
So find the best tune for your car, have fun and... "Just Drift It" !

Features:

* 5 vehicles
* Custom Vehicle Physics
* Tuning parameters for suspension, Gearbox, Wheel alignment ( camber angle ) and others...
* 4 tracks
* Leaderborads
* Controller support
